name: the bitcoin hackerspace network initiative - hackerspace credential
description: JSON schema for a verifiable credential representing a hackerspace participating in the bitcoin hackerspace network initiative

schema.description: Details about the hackerspace network that the issuer and member belong to.

name.description: The name of the network of hackerspaces that the issuer and member belong to.

hackerspaces.description: The hackerspaces participathing in the network that the member belongs to.

countries.description: The countries where the hackerspaces participating in the network are located.

states.description: The states where the hackerspaces participating in the network are located.

cities.description: The cities where the hackerspaces participating in the network are located.
